title: Portfolio website
description: I designed and built this website to showcase my work and to learn more about Gatsby, CI/CD and experience implementing my own designs

title: Oven consumption calculator
description: Developed the consumption model and webapp for a parametric consumption calculator of ovens, with downloadable PDF report.

title: wireframing a community app
description: During the HIT UX Challenge 2024, a 7 days design sprint, I worked with a team of 4 conceptualize a community app.

title: Music festival website design
description: Designed a website for a mock music festival, starting from from the branding to the wireframes and final high-fidelity prototype.
